trans-unit.source: Forms the basis for the strongly typed collections that are members of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description"></xref> namespace.
Returns the name of the key associated with the value passed by reference.
The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class in order to return the name of the key associated with the `value` parameter.
The default implementation returns null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
An object for which to return the name of the key.
A null reference.
Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection"></xref> instance.
This method is intended to be overridden to perform additional processes when clearing the contents of a derived collection.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
Performs additional custom processes after inserting a new element into the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection"></xref>.
The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action when the specified element is inserted.
For example, a derived class might need additional validation.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
The zero-based index at which to insert the value parameter.
The element to insert into the collection.
Removes an element from the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection"></xref>.
This method is intended to be overridden to perform additional processes, such as validation, when an element is removed from the collection.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
The zero-based index of the value parameter to be removed.
The element to remove from the collection.
Replaces one value with another within the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection"></xref>.
The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden to perform additional processes, such as validation, when setting the value of an element in the collection.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
The zero-based index where the oldValue parameter can be found.
The object to replace with the newValue parameter.
The object that replaces the oldValue parameter.
Sets the parent object of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection"></xref> instance.

The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to set a parent of an appropriate class, based upon the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification.
The default implementation performs no action.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
The object for which to set the parent object.
The object to set as the parent.
Gets an interface that implements the association of the keys and values in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection"></xref>.
The default implementation returns a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> to associate the keys and values.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
An interface that implements the association of the keys and values in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection"></xref>.
